a panel on the Religion of Peace will be held in honor of the International Day of Conflict Resolution on Oct  PERIOD

The panelists include representatives from different religious affiliations from across the valley PERIOD

The event will be held between  to  p.m PERIOD in the Alice Peters Auditorium in Peters Building  PERIOD

Along with the panel there will be a peace exhibition displayed in the Diversity Lounge of the Henry Madden Library throughout the month of October PERIOD

For more information contact Ethics Center Director Dr PERIOD Andrew Fiala  PERIOD

Your donation will support the student journalists of Fresno State Your contribution will allow us to purchase equipment and cover our annual website hosting costs PERIOD
